column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3:
それは太古の女神が創られた武器……

選ばれし騎士のみが持つ事を許され厄災を打ち倒せるという
退魔の剣
column4:
That is the weapon created by the ancient Goddess.The sword that seals the darkness—that only the
chosen knight can wield against the Calamity Ganon.

column3:
主は……



やっと現れたか……
column4: Hrm?Well, well...it's you.You finally decided to return.

column3:
100年の時主が ここを訪れるのを待っておったぞ

いささか待ちくたびれてしもうたがな……
column4:
Better late than never.After 100 years, I'd nearly given up
hope on seeing you again.Even my patience has limits, you know...

column3: ……だが主の方は やはり覚えておらぬようじゃな
column4:
That look on your face tells me that you have no
recollection of me, however.

column3:
儂は このハイラルを見守り続ける者

皆からは デクの樹 と呼ばれておる老木よ……
column4:
I have watched over Hyrule since time immemorial.Many have referred to me over the ages
as the Deku Tree.

column3: そして100年前それを手にしておったのは他ならぬ主なのだ
column4:
Believe it or not...it was actually you who wielded
that sword 100 years ago.

column3: 今の主に果たしてそれを抜けるかどうか……
column4:
As you are now, I cannot say whether you are 
worthy or not...

column3:
もし主が衰えた体のまま引き抜こうとすれば
立ち処に命を失う事になるでな
column4:
If you sought to free the sword in any sort of
weakened state, you would surely lose your life
where you stand.

column3: 気を付けるが良いぞ……
column4: Best of luck, young one...

column3:
ん……
おお
……うたた寝しておったようじゃの
column4: Who is that...?Did I doze off again?

column3: だが気をつけろ……
column4: But I must warn you to take extreme caution.

column3: その剣を手に入れようとする者は剣自身に試される……
column4:
The sword stands as a test to anyone who would
dare attempt to possess it.

column3:
？
※不思議そうに「なにごと？」
column4:
?
※As in 「Hm? What's going on?」

column3: 「だれだれ？」
column4: 「Who is it?」

column3: 「しってるひと？」
column4: 「Someone we know?」

column4: *laughter*

column4: *laughter*

column4: When pulling out right side→Cheering on 1 (Not too noisy)

column4: The moment the hands leave the sword→takes damage

column4: When pulling out right side→Cheering on 2 (Not too noisy)

column4: Wobbling then falling down→Weak voice cries out then cut short

column3: 01が倒れる→「きゅわわわわわ～～！！」とおののく
column4: 01 falls down→Tremble like \"Kyuwawawa!\"
